channel.title: Making 3D Models, And Getting Them In-game
channel.description:
Hey, did a quick search on the forums, didn't find anything, i can't make a server for various reasons, so i wanted to try my hand at making E E K (of f2p-pkz.myftp.org) some models and so i want to know the whole process of model making, even the end that i'm not doing, to make it clearer what's needed.
if anyone could help, it would be awesome.. i have googled this a few times, and all it came up with was guides on making money in rs.. phail

item.title: Making 3D Models, And Getting Them In-game

item.description:

T3mp3st:

Hey, did a quick search on the forums, didn’t find anything,

No you didnt!

moparisthebest.com
